sentences.en: Well, I'll have beef pie, sauté fish and tomato soup.
sentences.cn: 好，我就要牛肉饼，红烧鱼和番茄汤。

sentences.en: Some ideas: Sauté some asparagus tips for a tasty omelet.
sentences.cn: 一些建议：可以在美味的煎蛋卷中加入一些芦笋尖。

sentences.en: The next time you roast or sauté meat, save the leftover juices and oil.
sentences.cn: 下次你烤肉或者煎肉的时候，把剩余的汁水和油留着。
